name: Kawi Resort
address: Br. Bukit, Tampaksiring, Jalan Doktor Ir. Soekarno, Sanding, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
Well, the service is really good.
The location is convenient if you are near Ubud. It is far away from other locations.
The forest and jungle are beautiful.
Bad thing, I was at 933 room, and it was noisy due to staff moved furniture. Even though I called the reception, they didn't stop until 11:45 pm. It happened twice on the 2nd and 3rd of April.
I recommend the breakfast continental, American, and Balinese breakfast.
The afternoon tea was nice.
Thanks, staff. You are awesome
review 2:
Was looking for an inexpensive place to chill near the tegalalang rice terraces and found this place. DO NOT MISS IT!
Food was amazing and cheaply priced, no entrance fee or minimum spend and you can take all the time you want in their lovely infinity pool. Staff is super friendly and available. Truly a gem of a place.
review 3: This resort was the highlight of my trip. It exceeded my expectations in terms of serenity, comfort, and privacy amidst nature. Rooms facing the valley were a delight. I extended my stay by two more nights as this is what I hoped for when I came to Ubud to enjoy and be in nature. The service was fantastic as well. Resort is quite close to Cretya, and the tirthan temple too.
review 4:
Room : good
Service: good
Location: Entrance gate a little small with 1 car size width. Need to slow down to look for it. It’s in the middle of mountain road. You need a transportation to go around.
Inside the resort it’s beautiful in the morning.
review 5:
Nestled within the lush embrace of Bali's verdant forests, Kawi Resort is a sanctuary of luxury and tranquility that offers an unparalleled escape from the ordinary. From the moment you set foot on its grounds, you're enveloped in a world of opulence and natural beauty, where every detail has been meticulously crafted to indulge the senses and soothe the soul.

As you wander through the resort's meticulously manicured gardens and winding pathways, the symphony of tropical birdsong and rustling leaves serenades you, inviting you to leave the stresses of everyday life behind and surrender to the rhythm of nature's embrace. The resort's architecture seamlessly blends with the surrounding landscape, creating a harmonious fusion of modern elegance and timeless charm.

The accommodations at Kawi Resort are nothing short of spectacular, with spacious villas and suites that offer every imaginable comfort and convenience. Each room is tastefully appointed with luxurious furnishings, sumptuous linens, and sweeping views of the surrounding forest canopy, providing a serene sanctuary where you can unwind and recharge in style.

One of the most enchanting aspects of Kawi Resort is its close proximity to nature, with its secluded location offering a rare opportunity to commune with the wild. While strolling through the resort's grounds, it's not uncommon to encounter the occasional wild lizard or other indigenous creatures, adding a touch of excitement and wonder to your stay.

For those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, Kawi Resort boasts a world-class spa where you can indulge in a range of holistic treatments and massages designed to soothe the body, mind, and spirit. Whether you choose to unwind with a traditional Balinese massage, rejuvenate with a refreshing facial, or simply soak in the tranquility of the resort's infinity pool, you'll emerge feeling renewed and revitalized from head to toe.

Of course, no stay at Kawi Resort would be complete without sampling the culinary delights on offer at its exquisite restaurants and bars. From farm-to-table fare crafted from the freshest local ingredients to innovative cocktails and fine wines curated from around the world, every dining experience is a celebration of the senses that promises to tantalize even the most discerning palate.

In conclusion, Kawi Resort is a hidden gem nestled within Bali's lush forests, where luxury meets nature in perfect harmony. From its elegantly appointed accommodations to its world-class amenities and enchanting wildlife encounters, every moment spent at Kawi Resort is a testament to the beauty and tranquility of the natural world.

name: Collina Kawi Restaurant
review 1:
Had a candlelight dinner here, and the food was delicious, Chef Wistana made sure everything was perfect

The restaurant is situated inside Kawi resort because of which you could enjoy the views of the resort along with the food, the atmosphere is peaceful along with the jungle vibe, their most exquisite offering is their candle light dinner and the Royal candle light dinner (the latter comes with music+better view+more decoration but is more pricey than the former) both the offering comes with a 4 course meal, they have various options you can select from for each course and you can let them know if have anything specific you would like to try in advance, below were my choices, I'm also attaching their menu here

Meal inclusions for candlelight dinner (IDR 1500000)
1. Amuse Bouche (Bruschetta and Spring roll)
2. Appetizer ( Caesar salad with chicken)
3. Soup (Leek potato soup and prawns gazpahco)
4. Main Course ( Roasted Duck and Beef Steak)
5. Dessert ( coconut ice cream and vanilla ice cream + chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream)
review 2: I'm so Happy we stoped here on our way to ubud. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Food was great but even better with the views! Would 100% recommend.
review 4: Good food and good view, perfect
review 5: Tasty food but small portions. Professional service and calm place in the nature.
